籤詩版本二:
Ukuguqulwa kukaBuddha okungokomoya nolwazi lwakho; inkulumo yesilima iphenduka i-coma
Ikhehla lacela isangoma, kungani singalindi isikhathi?
詩意:
Le hexagram iwuphawu lokuyigcina ingashintshi futhi inganyakazi.
Konke kuza ngesikhathi esihle.
解曰:
Inhlanhla ephelele. Ngizokunika okusemandleni ami. Ungathinti ukholo oludala. Isikhathi sokulinda.
Lolu wuphawu olugcwele. Konke kuhamba kabi. Isibusiso esikhulu. Kungaqinisekisa ukuthula.
籤詩故事一:
◇Izinkolo Ezintathu Zikhuluma
Phakathi nokubusa koMbusi uWu woBukhosi BakwaZhou baseNyakatho, lezi zinkolo ezintathu (uConfucianism, ubuBuddha, nobuTao) zazihlukene. Umbusi wabiza umhlangano omkhulu futhi wacela izinkulumo-mpikiswano phakathi kobuConfucian, ubuBuddha nobuTao.* Ngemva kwezinkulumo-mpikiswano ezintathu, akuzange kufinyelelwe esiphethweni.
Le ndaba ingumfanekiso: lezi zinkolo ezintathu ziyinkolo eyodwa, isiwula esingenangqondo, umuntu onamandla nophikisanayo, kanye nezenzo zesiwula.
聖意: Lokhu kuwuphawu olugcwele.Konke kuzoba okungalungile.Kuzoletha izibusiso ezinkulu futhi kuqinisekise ukuthula.
